div.p: RESIGNATION ill general, ſigniſies the implicit ſubmiſſion of ourſelves, or of ſomething we poffeſs,. to the will of another. In a religious ſenſe it ſignifies a perfect ſubmiſſion, without difcontent, to the will of God. See Moral Philosophy, n 0 119.
